description:
Description


Oddtype's Unveiled Skin Highlighter provides a dewy glow that captivates with every application. Made in Korea
This innovative highlighter stick delivers an unparalleled radiance infused with natural shimmers, creating a touchable, ethereal finish that effortlessly melts into your skin.
Crafted with pure shades reminiscent of the delicate hues of light, each stroke of this luminous balm imparts a natural glow that enhances your features.
Versatile and multi-use, the Unveiled Skin Highlighter can be applied to the cheeks, nose, around the eyes, lips, and any desired area to add dimension and luminosity to your look
Oddtype is committed to shaping a sustainable future. All their products, including Unveiled Skin Highlighter, are cruelty-free and free from animal-derived ingredients.
 
How To Use

Refer to the Detailed images
Cautions : 1. If you experience any abnormal symptoms or side effects such as red spots, swelling, or itchiness on the area of use due to direct sunlight when using or after using cosmetics, consult a specialist. 2. Do not use on wounded areas, etc. 3. reviews.title: Cute
reviews.content: I ordered from here less than a week ago, got a bunch of stuff in the $8.88 sale, hit the $90 free shipping benchmark and then was able to use a coupon to pay only $75 for like a lot of great products. I didn't at all trust the 3-5 day shipping estimate, but then it arrived from South Korea to NY in 4 days?! I was impressed, not even gonna lie. I don't know why one of the reviews on here says the products are very convincing dupes, I even compared the replacement beauty of joseon sunscreen I got with the one I'm nearly out of, and it's simply the same exact product, and the other two sunscreens I got with my order are totally distinctive and great formulas, so I'm curious what their experience was...

description:
Description

GLINT HIGHLIGHTER, DIAMOND VEIL (2.3g/0.08oz) - Illuminate your complexion with Glint Dewy Highlighter, offering a luminous glow reminiscent of flowing light. Infused with delicate micro-pearls, it creates a sophisticated and natural radiance.
MULTI-FACETED GLOW - Achieve a natural glow suitable for everyday wear. Glint Dewy Highlighter's finely milled pearls and baked formula ensure a smooth application without dryness or flaking, enhancing your skin's natural luminosity.
CHOICE OF SHADES - Available in enchanting options like Dewy Moon, Diamond Veil, Chrome Baby, Milky Moon, and Pitch Moon. Each shade offers a unique shimmer, from champagne sheen to mysterious milky pink, catering to diverse skin tones and preferences.
VERSATILE APPLICATION - Beyond highlighting, use it as blush or eyeshadow for a seamless makeup look. Perfect for those seeking long-lasting radiance without the drawbacks of excessive glitter or artificial finish found in other products.
GLINT - Glint stands as a testament to the belief that simplicity should never be mistaken for dullness. Our makeup brand is committed to elevating your natural radiance, allowing you to shine brilliantly every single day. Step into a realm where beauty meets simplicity because, at Glint, you deserve to glow.

What makes Glint Highlighter special?

Glint Highlighter offers a luxurious, natural glow with delicate micro-pearls and a moisture-rich, baked formula for a smooth, non-drying finish.

How do I apply Glint Highlighter for the best results?

Apply with fingers or a brush to desired areas. Layer to achieve a more dramatic glow that blends naturally with your skin tone.

Description

House of Hur's Moist Ampoule Blusher effortlessly enhances your skin's natural beauty with its unique shades and smooth application. 
With a diverse range of colors that complement all skin tones, it seamlessly blends into your skin for a healthy glow.
 Its smooth texture makes applying makeup a breeze, allowing you to express your personality through its distinct hues. 
This product helps highlight your natural charm while also allowing for vibrant skin expression at the same time.

Enriched with 50% moisture essence, it provides long-lasting, hydrating, and lightweight adherence to the skin without that sticky feeling.
How To Use

After completing your skincare and base makeup, apply a small amount on the back of your hand and lightly pat it on both cheeks while blending the product. (Shake lightly before applying to mix evenly. Gently tap onto the skin for uniform absorption without any irritation.) 

After completing your skincare and base makeup, apply a small amount of the ampoule blusher onto both cheeks. You can adjust as needed for different makeup styles. Layering it will intensify the glow, making it easier for you to achieve your desired makeup look effortlessly.

reviews.title: Blush shade much paler than swatches!
reviews.content: This blush has a very strong milky base, so if you wear anything darker than a shade 21 in Korean cushion, this blush will likely not show up on your skin. the powder is also pressed quite deeply in the pan so it may take a while to build up any pigment. I bought two of these blushes to use the shades as a powder highlight to build contrast against brighter/darker blushes, and it works great for that purpose, but on its own it leaves practically no pigment on my skin, which is unusual even within Korean blushes for me as I can wear some shade 23 cushions. I do recommend this to people who are too pale for pigmented blushes, especially with how customizable it is, but this did not work for me.

reviews.title: Natural soft color
reviews.content: I'm so truly in love with this liquid blush! The nail polish-like applicator is an interesting choice but seems to work well. When I apply the blush to my cheek bone area, I make a couple of dots and wait about 5 minutes before blending, because at first it's a little too thin/watery for me to blend the most effectively. After the 5 minutes, I use my soft jelly/silicone tipped cheek blender (like the ones used for blending lip colors but a bit larger). I tap it in a circular spiral motion, going from the dots of blush and outward so that it blends around my cheekbone or the "apple" of my upper cheek. I can then blend the color out to whatever direction I prefer for a particular look. I've never tried a liquid blush that had this perfect natural color that isn't as intense as the American made liquid blushes that I've tried. The color is definitely buildable to whatever amount of pigment you want. I believe I tried the cherry blossom version and it's perfect!
